title: Fragment, late 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of blue cut and uncut velvet on tan silk ground. Design of tiny flowering branches. Alternate horizontal rows pointing right and left.
